info.name: Live Transcription in Talk
info.summary: Provides live transcriptions in Nextcloud Talk calls.
info.description:
Provides live transcriptions in Nextcloud Talk calls. High-performance backend (HPB) is required for this app to work.
IMPORTANT: Environment variables "LT_HPB_URL" and "LT_INTERNAL_SECRET" are required to be set in "Deploy Options" near the "Deploy and Enable" button before the install.
info.author: Anupam Kumar
Marcel Klehr
Alexander Piskun

variable.name: LT_HPB_URL
variable.description: URL of the high-performance backend, same as the URL in the admin settings of Talk. It ends in "/spreed" usually and looks something like "wss://cloud.example.com/standalone-signaling/spreed".

variable.name: LT_INTERNAL_SECRET
variable.display-name: Internal secret of the high-performance backend
variable.description: Internal secret used to authenticate with the high-performance backend. This is not the same as the shared secret in the admin settings of Talk.

variable.name: SKIP_CERT_VERIFY
variable.description: When set to "true" or "1", certificate verifications will be skipped for the websocket connections to the HPB.
